description: This file defines the Lessons API service, including data types, interfaces, and functions for managing lessons, such as fetching, creating, updating, deleting lessons, and handling AI content and video URLs.

methods.name: getLessons
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of lessons with optional filtering and sorting.

methods.name: getLessonsByCourse
methods.description: Retrieves lessons associated with a specific course ID.

methods.name: getLesson
methods.description: Fetches details of a single lesson by its ID.

methods.name: createLesson
methods.description: Creates a new lesson with provided data.

methods.name: updateLesson
methods.description: Updates an existing lesson identified by lessonId.

methods.name: deleteLesson
methods.description: Deletes a lesson by its ID.

methods.name: getLessonContent
methods.description: Retrieves AI-generated content (summary and quiz) for a lesson.

methods.name: submitQuiz
methods.description: Submits quiz answers and updates the lesson's readiness score.

methods.name: generateAIContent
methods.description: Generates AI content for a lesson.

methods.name: getLessonVideoViewUrl
methods.description: Obtains a presigned URL for viewing the lesson's video.
